text: Navitʹ yakshcho vy povertayete u budʹ-yakyy riznovyd stvorennya shcho vy vvazhayete nemozhlyvyy." Vony todi skazhutʹ, "Khto prynese nam nazad?" Skazhitʹ, khto utvoryv vas u pershu cherhu." Vony todi skhvylyuyutʹsya yikhni holovy ta kazhutʹ, "Koly shcho budutʹ?" Skazhitʹ, "Mozhlyvo blyzhchyy nizh vy dumayete
